CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Book Flight stage positioned above or below the Select Accommodation stage?
SRP.A: The Book Flight stage is positioned {below} the Select Accommodation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Book Flight?
VE.A: The value of stage Book Flight is {1993}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Make Reservation?
VE.A: The value of stage Make Reservation is {1119}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Select Accommodation?
VE.A: The value of stage Select Accommodation is {2865}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Select Accommodation, with a value of {2865}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Travel to Destination, with a value of {436}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Select Accommodation to stage Book Flight?
SC.A: Decreased by {872} Thousand Tourists from stage Select Accommodation to stage Book Flight.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 777? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Select Accommodation} stage has {2865}, the {Book Flight} stage has {1993}, the {Make Reservation} stage has {1119}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 2429? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Book Flight} stage has {1993}, the {Make Reservation} stage has {1119}, the {Travel to Destination} stage has {436}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 777 and 2429? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Book Flight} stage has {1993}, the {Make Reservation} stage has {1119}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight, or from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Select Accommodation} to {Book Flight} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation, from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight, or from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Flight} to stage {Make Reservation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Book Flight} and {Make Reservation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Make Reservation} and {Travel to Destination} stages.
